Text: I also couldn't believe it when it turned out to be 160kb...cheers!

Well, I sure hope this is from a pristine source then... so that I don't download flac-encoded decompressed 160kbps mp3s... :P

I just have to trust the Cubans then I suppose.
Cheers

CD -> EAC -> FLAC... and of course, a cigar ;-)

Yankees out of Guantanamo! Go torture in your own territory modafuckers!

Down with American imperialism!

Thanks Fidel,

Good thing you had that cigar... cause as every audiophile knows, its the little things around the system that makes the sound better. 

Some crazy dudes say that certain tinfoil-wrappings, 2000$ power cables and interconnects, demagnetizers and so on does the trick. 

Personally I know that the cigar, the whisky (or rum) and good company is the ultimate tweak ;)

Happy new year
//G
